description: Kuala Lumpur, Hong Kong, Japan each offer a glimpse to the intangible features that attract affection. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Cities can be liveable. But what makes them lovable?
title_page: Cities can be liveable. But what makes them lovable? | The Straits Times
maintext:
Many visitors to Kuala Lumpur go up the 421m-high KL Tower for glittering views of Malaysia’s capital city.
For my family on a recent trip, the highlight came at the end of our dinner at the tower’s revolving restaurant.
